text:
You could do something like this:
```julia> v = zeros(2, 3);

julia> for (i, vᵢ) in enumerate(eachcol(v))
           vᵢ .= i^2
       end

julia> v
2×3 Array{Float64,2}:
 1.0  4.0  9.0
 1.0  4.0  9.0```
